greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Decimal expansion of x such that x^2 + x^3 + x^5 + x^7 + x^11 + x^13 + x^17 + ... = 1.
comment: A constant appearing in the asymptotic formula for the number of prime additive compositions. See Finch's article.
link: S. R. Finch, Kalmar's composition constant, June 5, 2003. [Cached copy, with permission of the author]
results.author: _Frank Ellermann_, May 23 2003
ext: More terms from _T. D. Noe_, Oct 14 2003
